remarks.format: ## Remarks 此实现`Close`调用方法并将其传递`true`值。This implementation of `Close` calls the method and passes it a `true` value. 除非显式调用，刷新的文本读取器不会刷新其基础编码器`Close`。Flushing the text reader will not flush its underlying encoder unless you explicitly call `Close`. 设置属性设置为`true`意味着数据从缓冲区刷新到流中，但编码器状态不会进行刷新。Setting the property to `true` means that data will be flushed from the buffer to the stream, but the encoder state will not be flushed. 这将允许编码器，以便它可以正确编码的字符的下一步块保持其状态 （部分字符）。This allows the encoder to keep its state (partial characters) so that it can encode the next block of characters correctly. 这种情况下会影响 UTF8，UTF7 其中某些字符可以仅后在编码器收到的相邻字符编码。This scenario affects UTF8 and UTF7 where certain characters can be encoded only after the encoder receives the adjacent character or characters. > [!NOTE] > 在派生类中，不会重写方法。In derived classes, do not override the method. 相反，重写方法添加代码以释放资源。Instead, override the method to add code for releasing resources.
